# xplor

> A unified framework for Operation Research modeling with polars

## Docs

### API Reference

#### Classes
> Core classes and types

- [VarType](https://gab23r.github.io/xplor/reference/VarType.html): The type of the variable
- [XplorGurobi](https://gab23r.github.io/xplor/reference/XplorGurobi.html): Xplor wrapper for the Gurobi solver
- [XplorMathOpt](https://gab23r.github.io/xplor/reference/XplorMathOpt.html): Xplor wrapper for the OR-Tools MathOpt solver
- [XplorHexaly](https://gab23r.github.io/xplor/reference/XplorHexaly.html): Xplor wrapper for the Hexaly solver

#### Other
> Additional exports

- [var](https://gab23r.github.io/xplor/reference/var.html): The entry point for creating custom expression objects (VarExpr) that represent
